mapper.select: select a.ROLE_NAME, count(a.ROLE_NAME) as roleCount from tb_role a group by a.ROLE_NAME
select b.ID, b.ROLE_NAME, b.CREATE_TIME from tb_user a, tb_role b, con_role_user c where a.USERNAME=#{username} and a.ID = c.USER_ID and b.ID = c.ROLE_ID
select b.ROLE_NAME from tb_user a, tb_role b, con_role_user c where a.ID=#{userId} and a.ID=c.USER_ID and b.ID=c.ROLE_ID
